thread.title: Empowering Single Parents Nationally: Iris Barratt’s Scholarship Initiative for Home-Based Event Entrepreneurs | FinancialContent Business Page
thread.title_full: Empowering Single Parents Nationally: Iris Barratt’s Scholarship Initiative for Home-Based Event Entrepreneurs | FinancialContent Business Page

author: Get News
title: Empowering Single Parents Nationally: Iris Barratt’s Scholarship Initiative for Home-Based Event Entrepreneurs | FinancialContent Business Page
text:
From Laughter to Learning: Iris Barratt's Mission to Transform Event Entertainment into Educational Opportunities for Single Parents
Oakridge, Oregon - Iris Barratt of Oakridge, Oregon is on a mission to empower single parents across the nation with her lucrative home-based business scholarships. In the US, there are currently 9.9 million single mothers and 21.2 million children living in single-parent families.
As an avid lifelong learner, Iris’ passion is creating and teaching programs that provide practical public benefits. As a seasoned event entertainer for over 30 years, Grandma Iris Barratt is now unveiling her newest uplifting honoring and comedy awards programs for events.
Evolving Genius Awards Ceremony programs brings suspense, joyful interpersonal honoring with keepsake awards, inspiring musical majesty, profound poetry, and enlivening laughter to create uplifting events for any group or occasion.
Iris is seeking online colleges, sponsorship funding, and celebrity endorsement to assist her in creating event program scholarships, and providing collaboration and mentoring for entertainers.
Evolving genius awards ceremony programs provides an excellent educational opportunity. Iris’ vision is to give away her creative legacy of event programs, collaborate with online colleges, and continue to mentor entertainers.
“I want to give away my legacy and mentor our youth enabling them to share the joy I have experienced as an event entertainer. Getting all dressed up and honoring people with meaningful, keepsake awards and applause creates genuine unity within the community and builds a strong sense of group connection. Giving away my programs (with several variations), will allow me to fulfil my vision/mission/legacy of collaborating and sharing my lucrative home-based business opportunity for event entertainers and watching families benefit nationwide,” says Iris Barratt
Iris plans to give away her appreciation event programs to find endorsements and sponsorships that will pay for student expenses and bring nationwide promotion.
Online colleges provide parents with the benefits of flexibility, affordability, improved skill sets, and improved school-life balance. It allows students to maintain their jobs, care for children, or simply prioritize self-care. Many single parents today seriously require this. They have jobs, families, and other commitments that prevent them from going to school in person. Parents need a program they can access anywhere, at any time.
Family events serve ages 8 and up, focusing on the thrill of honoring others and being honored with meaningful, poetic Nobility Awards. These awards of honor (22) include Awards like Childlike Wonder, Lovable Laughter, Valuable Volunteer, Free Spirit, Honorary Caregiver, Loving Kindness, Gifted and Talented Child, Spirit of Compassion, Humanitarian Hero, Lifelong Learning, Illustrious Instigator and Humanitarian Healing.
“Being honored and genuinely honoring others deepens our sense of belonging and builds self-esteem too. Laughing together and at ourselves is priceless!” Everyone walks the red carpet to uplifting music, receives their Nobility Award of Honor, and gives a short gratitude speech with thrilling applause!” She added.
Iris’ sassy clean comedy version, offers funny Wake-up Call Awards like Narcissistic Numb-skull, Beneficial Bullshitter, Mindless Moocher, Passionate Pack Rat, Gossip Monger, Conscientious Couch Potato, and Morbid Martyrdom. Over 20 super poignant, funny sassy awards to choose from. This clean comedy program for ages 15 to adult is brilliant personal growth at its very best because it is so universal, everyone gets it!
Large groups have the option of choosing to vote for Insightful Inclinations (66 options) for their peers, rather than give acceptance speeches. This keeps the flow of award presentations moving while honoring your people in another totally fun and inspiring way.
These inspiring Awards Ceremony programs are the perfect appreciation event for clients, employees, volunteers, donors, retirement, team building, or fundraising. Colorful keepsake awards and poignant award-winning poetry by Grandma Iris Barratt are enchanting event gifts.
Please contact Iris Barratt for online college collaboration, sponsorship funding, celebrity endorsement, and mentorship support!
Let’s collaborate together and provide elegant, lucrative businesses nationwide to empower the young generation of techie smart parents and honor everyone in the process. The best part is everyone gets scholarships because Iris is choosing to generously give them away!
